description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for product-related endpoints in a backend API, including standard CRUD operations and admin-specific actions, with Swagger documentation annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all active products.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a product by ID.

methods.name: adminCreate
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new product (admin only).

methods.name: adminUpdate
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a product by ID (admin only).

methods.name: adminRemove
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to remove a product by ID (admin only).
